q: Jay Gruden hasn't received any overriding direction from Marvin Lewis on how to run the offense. "He's the head coach, so whatever vision he has is my vision," Jay Gruden said. If he has a vision of running the ball 30 times, then that's going to be the vision. We'll do the best we can to appease him. But there's been no vision that's been told to me right now. It's just come on in here, install your offense and let's make a change.-- Joe Kay Eagles promote two defensive coaches PHILADELPHIA( AP)- The Philadelphia Eagles have promoted Mike Munchak Caldwell to linebackers coach and Michael Vick Zordich to secondary/safeties coach. Both the Obama administration's auto task force and Sergio Marchionne insisted that the dealer network be shrunk to accelerate the consolidation of four brands in every showroom and to reduce intra-brand competition in metropolitan areas. , will henceforth concentrated on "strategic projects, in particular working on new products." Although Eric Schmidt is stepping down as chief executive, Google said he will take on the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-- all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin .
